about_the_game:
A merciless multiplayer survival challenge. Trust is fragile when betrayal lurks in every shadow. Dive into a world where alliances are as unstable as the harsh conditions you face. Will you outwit your friends and survive the impending doom?



Experience the thrill and treachery in 12-player multiplayer mode, online or over LAN. Work together to complete quests and outlast the winter, but more importantly, can you see through the deception among your allies?

  • Diverse strategies, unique mechanics: Each game unfolds differently. Will you be a cunning saboteur or a dedicated gatherer?
  • Work together to overcome obstacles and gather resources. The locals don't take kindly to carrot-stealing visitors, but you’ll need snacks to make it through winter.
  • Stealth and strategy: Utilize the terrain to your advantage against the dangerous environment. Navigate in between hiding spots and dense underbrush while keeping an eye on your companions – are they really helping?





You'll need to work together if you want to survive past winter. Dynamic time and weather systems make exploration dangerous and unpredictable. Be mindful not to get stranded alone in the cold!

  • Prepare and survive against dangerous weather changes!
  • Mind the time and don't get lost at night!
  • Cold slows you down and makes you vulnerable, so stay warm!





Prepare for the unpredictable in the safety of your burrow. Unlock new maps and upgrades while you wait for your friends to get ready to play.

  • Relax and get ready in your home burrow while waiting for the rest of your friends to join.
  • Get upgraded! Spend the resources you gathered to unlock tools and upgrades which will make your job easier.
  • Unlock new maps and areas for you and your friends to explore.
detailed_description:
ADD THE GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST TO KNOW WHEN IT GETS A DISCOUNT!

  • Work together to overcome obstacles and gather resources. The locals don't take kindly to carrot-stealing visitors, but you’ll need snacks to make it through winter.
  • Stealth and strategy: Utilize the terrain to your advantage against the dangerous environment. Navigate in between hiding spots and dense underbrush while keeping an eye on your companions – are they really helping?

legal_notice: No rabbits were harmed in the making of this video game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 666 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 666 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Preferably

name: Bunny Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10, Windows 11 (compatible with Steam Deck)
  • Processor: 2-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 4-Core 3.2 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (or equivalent)

short_description: A multiplayer social deduction game for up to 12 players. Bunnies stock up for winter, while traitors plan mischief. Better watch your back!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Portuguese - Brazil, Greek, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Hindi, Latvian, Lithuanian
